configuration.openSourcetreeButton.prior: The priority given to the statusbar button
configuration.openSourcetreeButton.Sourc: Path to the Sourcetree executable (configure this if it doesn't work by default).
configuration.openSourcetreeButton.icon: The Codicon icon to use for the status bar item. See https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/icons-in-labels#icon-listing for available icons.
commands.tettekete.openSourcetreeButton: Open In SourceTree Button: open SourceTree
commands.tettekete.setSourceTreePath: Open In SourceTree Button: Set the SourceTree path in the file selection dialog.
